text: Kiran Nagarkar (1942 - 5 September 2019) was an Indian novelist, playwright, critic and screenwriter.Sanga, p. 177 He was born in Mumbai. His best known works are Saat Sakkam Trechalis (tr. Seven Sixes Are Forty Three) (1974), Ravan and Eddie (1994), and the epic novel, Cuckold (1997) for which he was awarded the 2001 Sahitya Akademi Award.Sahitya Akademi Awards 1955â€“2007: English Sahitya Akademi Official website. Nagarkar died on 5 September, 2019 from a cerebral hemorrhage in Mumbai at the age of 77.Author Kiran Nagarkar passes away at 77 in Mumbai ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from cerebral hemorrhage Category:Indian screenwriters Category:Indian novelists Category:Indian playwrights Category:Indian critics Category:Writers from Mumbai Category:Marathi people
title: Kiran Nagarkar
